details.name: Ammo Saver
details.description: Occasionally returns ammo or phials to inventory when firing. (20% Chance)

details.name: Elementality
details.description: Same effect as Element Attack Up and Item Use Up.

details.name: Hazefur Talisman
details.description: Combines the effects of Negate Poison, Anti-Theft and Autotracker.

details.name: Steelshell Talisman
details.description: Combines the effects of Polar Hunter, Windproof (Hi) and Negate Bind.

details.name: Pyroscale Talisman
details.description: Combines the effects of Tropic Hunter, Fire Res +20 and Bio Researcher.

details.name: Anti-Theft
details.description: Prevents item theft.

details.name: Artillery Expert
details.description: Increases power of Ballista, Cannon, Gunlance, Wyvern's Fire & Crag shots, Impact C. Blade phials. (Ballista, Cannon, Crag S, Gunlance Shells, and Wyvernfire x1.20. Charge Blade's Finisher x1.30. Decreases Wyvernfire cooldown to 90 sec)

details.name: Artillery Novice
details.description: Slightly increases power of Ballista, Cannon, Gunlance, Wyvern's Fire & Crag shots, Impact C. Blade phials. (Ballista, Cannon, Crag S, Gunlance Shells, and Wyvernfire x1.10. Charge Blade's Finisher x1.15)

details.name: Attack Up (L)
details.description: Greatly increases Attack. (Attack +20)

details.name: Attack Up (M)
details.description: Increases Attack. (Attack +15)

details.name: Attack Up (S)
details.description: Slightly increases Attack. (Attack +10)

details.name: Attack Down (S)
details.description: Slightly decreases Attack. (Attack -5)

details.name: Attack Down (M)
details.description: Decreases Attack. (Attack -10)

details.name: Attack Down (L)
details.description: Greatly decreases Attack. (Attack -15)

details.name: Bounty Hunter
details.description: Same effects as Great Luck and Capture Expert.

details.name: Soul of Bherna
details.description: Combines the effects of Fire Res +15 and Halve Hunger.

details.name: Negate Bind
details.description: Negates the effects of Bind statuses such as Snowman and bubbles that impede movement.

details.name: Bio Master
details.description: Increases Dung Bomb efficacy and guarantees their combination, prevents Stench and Blastblight, and delays Virus onset.

details.name: Bio Researcher
details.description: Increases Dung Bomb efficacy and guarantees their combination, prevents Stench and Blastblight.

details.name: Bladescale Hone
details.description: Dodging while weapon is drawn will have various special effects. Improves C.Range Coating for Bows. (Same effect as Seregios weapons, auto-reload for Bowguns becomes a chance. Seregios Blade weapons do not stack)

details.name: Use Blast Coat
details.description: Allows Blast coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Negate Bleeding
details.description: Prevents Bleeding.

details.name: Double Bleeding
details.description: Doubles the damage received from Bleeding.

details.name: Blightproof
details.description: Negates all elemental blights (Fire, Water, Thunder, Ice, and Dragon).

details.name: Bloodbath Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Attack Up (L) and Evasion +2.

details.name: Bloodbath Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Attack Up (L), Evasion +2 and Composed.

details.name: Bludgeoner
details.description: Increases Attack based on how low the Sharpness of your weapon is. (Green = x1.1), (Yellow = x1.15) and (Orange/Red = x1.2)

details.name: Boltreaver Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Critical Boost, Bonus Shot and Sharpness +1.

details.name: Boltreaver Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Critical Boost, Bonus Shot, Sharpness +1 and Chance Seizer.

details.name: Bombardier
details.description: Increases bomb damage, and raises the Combination success rate for all bombs to 100%. (Bomb damage x1.30, Blast x1.20; x1.25 if Felyne Pyro is active)

details.name: Pro Herbology
details.description: Increases the amount of Health recovered from eating Herbs, even more than the Herbology skill. (Recovers 50 Health)

details.name: Herbology
details.description: Increases the amount of Health recovered from eating Herbs. (Recovers 30 Health)

details.name: Heavy Hitter
details.description: Same effects as Knockout King and Stamina Thief.

details.name: Ruthlessness
details.description: Same effects as Weakness Exploit and Critical Eye +2.

details.name: Bubbly Dance
details.description: Evading covers you in bubbles, improving your ability to dodge enemy attacks. (Grants Evasion +1 and Constitution +1)

details.name: Use C.Range Coat
details.description: Allows Close-range coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Capture Master
details.description: Often increases the number of Reward Items received for captures.

details.name: Capture Expert
details.description: Sometimes increases the number of Reward Items received for captures.

details.name: Meat Lover
details.description: Raw Meat becomes edible. Rare and Well-done Steaks temporarily grant unlimited Stamina.

details.name: Carving Expert
details.description: Increases the number of carving chances by one and prevents knockbacks while carving.

details.name: Carving Pro
details.description: Prevents knockbacks from attacks while carving.

details.name: Repeat Offender
details.description: Increases Affinity following repeated attacks. (1 successful hit will grant 25% Affinity, 5 more consecutive hits will grant 30% Affinity, missing an attack or not attacking for 5 seconds will reset the skill.)

details.name: Trump Card
details.description: Increases Hunter Art power during fights with large monsters when the chance arises.

details.name: Charm Chaser
details.description: Allows you to mine two Charms at once... Maybe. (30% chance)

details.name: Charm Collector
details.description: Allows you to mine two Charms at once... Maaaybe. (20% chance)

details.name: Use Any Clust S
details.description: Allows all levels of Cluster shots (Clust S) to be loaded.

details.name: Use Lv1 Clust S
details.description: Allows Lv1 Cluster shots (Clust S) to be loaded.

details.name: Polar Hunter
details.description: Powers you up in the cold. If you drink a Cool Drink... (Grants Cold Cancel, Attack +15 and Defense +20 in Cold Areas, Cool Drinks give +5 Attack.)

details.name: Cold Cancel
details.description: Negates all cold.

details.name: Cold Surge
details.description: Increases the speed at which your maximum Stamina depletes from cold.

details.name: Combination Pro
details.description: Guarantees maximum results with Combinations that can produce more than one item at a time.

details.name: Combination +45%
details.description: Increases your Combination success rate by 45%.

details.name: Combination +20%
details.description: Increases your Combination success rate by 20%.

details.name: Combination -10%
details.description: Decreases your Combination success rate by 10%.

details.name: Combination -20%
details.description: Decreases your Combination success rate by 20%.

details.name: Constitution +2
details.description: Greatly slows Stamina depletion when evading/blocking. Enables dive-evade in any direction. (50% slower stamina drain)

details.name: Constitution +1
details.description: Slows Stamina depletion when evading/blocking. Enables dive-evade in any direction. (25% slower stamina drain)

details.name: Constitution -1
details.description: Speeds up Stamina depletion when evading, blocking, etc. (20% faster stamina drain)

details.name: Constitution -2
details.description: Greatly speeds up Stamina depletion when evading, blocking, etc. (35% faster stamina drain)

details.name: Clandestine
details.description: Same effects as Load Up, Combination +20%, and Sneak.

details.name: Use Any Crag S
details.description: Allows all levels of Crag shots (Crag S) to be loaded.

details.name: Use Lv1 Crag S
details.description: Allows Lv1 Crag shots (Crag S) to be loaded.

details.name: Resuscitate
details.description: Increases Attack when you are suffering from abnormal status. (Attack +20)

details.name: Critical Draw
details.description: Increases Affinity for all draw attacks by 100%.

details.name: Elemental Crit
details.description: Increases elemental damage (Fire, Water, Thunder, Ice, Dragon) of your critical hits.

details.name: Status Crit
details.description: Increases abnormal status attack potency (Sleep, Blast, Poison, Paralysis) of your critical hits.

details.name: Critical Boost
details.description: Increases the damage of critical hits. (Boosts Critical hit damage from x1.25 to x1.40).

details.name: Crystalbeard Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Charm Chaser and Negate Hunger.

details.name: Crystalbeard Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Charm Chaser, Hero's Talisman and Negate Hunger.

details.name: Pro Dirty Fencer
details.description: Combines the effects of Fortify, Marathon Runner, and Stamina Thief.

details.name: Shot Booster
details.description: Prolongs the time window certain ammo and arrows can hit at maximum power.

details.name: Deadeye Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Negate Stun and Challenger +2.

details.name: Deadeye Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Negate Stun, Challenger +2 and Fortify.

details.name: Defense Up (L)
details.description: Greatly increases Defense. (Defense x1.05 and +25)

details.name: Defense Up (M)
details.description: Increases Defense. (Defense x1.03 and +20)

details.name: Defense Up (S)
details.description: Small increase in Defense. (Defense +15)

details.name: Defense Down (S)
details.description: Slightly decreases Defense. (Never less than 1)

details.name: Defense Down (M)
details.description: Decreases Defense. (Never less than 1)

details.name: Defense Down (L)
details.description: Greatly decreases Defense. (Never less than 1)

details.name: Iron Skin
details.description: Negates the effects of Defense Down.

details.name: Partbreaker
details.description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters. (Damage x1.30)

details.name: Endurance Runner
details.description: Stops stamina depletion below a certain point while dashing, allowing for a longer dash. (Stamina will not decrease below 25 when dashing)

details.name: Dragon Atk +2
details.description: Greatly increases the power of Dragon attacks and Dragon shots (Dragon S). (Dragon attack x1.1 + 60)

details.name: Dragon Atk +1
details.description: Increases the power of Dragon attacks and Dragon shots (Dragon S). (Dragon attack x1.05 + 40)

details.name: Dragon Atk Down
details.description: Decreases the power of Dragon attacks and Dragon shots (Dragon S). (Dragon attack x0.75)

details.name: Dragon Res +20
details.description: Increases Dragon resistance by 20.

details.name: Dragon Res +15
details.description: Increases Dragon resistance by 15.

details.name: Dragon Res -20
details.description: Decreases Dragon resistance by 20.

details.name: Dragonheart
details.description: When Health falls below 2/3, you'll get Dragonblight but elemental resistance and attack increases.(Attack and Defence x1.1, Maxes Elemental Res to 50, Dragon element weapons retain element)

details.name: Dreadking Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Attack Up (L) and Windproof (Hi).

details.name: Dreadking Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Attack Up (L), Windproof (Hi) and Adrenaline +1.

details.name: Dreadqueen Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Status Atk +2 and Wide-Range +2.

details.name: Dreadqueen Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Status Atk +2, Wide-Range +2 and Herbalist.

details.name: Drilltusk Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Adrenaline +2 and Scavenger.

details.name: Drilltusk Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Adrenaline +2, Scavenger and Artillery Expert.

details.name: Speed Eating +2
details.description: Increases meat-eating and item-consuming speed.

details.name: Speed Eating +1
details.description: Increases meat-eating speed.

details.name: Slow Eater
details.description: Decreases meat-eating speed.

details.name: Steady Hand
details.description: Same effects as Mind's Eye and Razor Sharp.

details.name: Honed Blade
details.description: Same effect as Attack Up (L) and Sharpness +1.

details.name: Elderfrost Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Marathon Runner, Bludgeoner and Normal/Rapid Up.

details.name: Elderfrost Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Marathon Runner, Bludgeoner, Normal/Rapid Up and Attack Up (M).

details.name: Element Phial (All)
details.description: Allows Elemental coatings of all levels to be set when wielding a Bow.

details.name: Element Phial (Lv1)
details.description: Allows Elem Coating Lv1 to be set when wielding a Bow.

details.name: Element Atk Up
details.description: Increases the power of elemental attacks. (Element x1.1)

details.name: Element Atk Down
details.description: Decreases the power of elemental attacks. (Element x0.9)

details.name: Chance Seizer
details.description: Fills the Arts Gauge, Valor Gauge and Alchemy Gauge when damage is received.

details.name: Evade Extender
details.description: Increases evade distance. (50% further)

details.name: Evasion +2
details.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading. (Normal time of 0.2 seconds is now 0.4 seconds.)

details.name: Evasion +1
details.description: Slightly extends the invulnerability period when evading. (Normal time of 0.2 seconds is now 0.33 seconds.)

details.name: Evasion Down
details.description: Reduces the invulnerability period when evading.

details.name: Use Exhaust Coat
details.description: Allows Exhaust coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Critical Eye +3
details.description: Increases Affinity by 30%.

details.name: Critical Eye +2
details.description: Increases Affinity by 20%.

details.name: Critical Eye +1
details.description: Increases Affinity by 10%.

details.name: Critical Eye -1
details.description: Decreases Affinity by 5%.

details.name: Critical Eye -2
details.description: Decreases Affinity by 10%.

details.name: Critical Eye -3
details.description: Decreases Affinity by 15%.

details.name: Focus
details.description: 20% faster charging for Dual Blades, Great Sword, Long Sword, Hammer, Switch Axe, Charge Blade, and Bow.

details.name: Distraction
details.description: 20% slower charging for Dual Blades, Great Sword, Long Sword, Hammer, Switch Axe, Charge Blade, and Bow.

details.name: Miraculous Luck
details.description: Very often increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

details.name: Great Luck
details.description: Often increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

details.name: Good Luck
details.description: Sometimes increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

details.name: Bad Luck
details.description: Sometimes decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

details.name: Horrible Luck
details.description: Often decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

details.name: Mind's Eye
details.description: Prevents your attacks from being deflected.

details.name: Blind Eye
details.description: Causes your attacks to be deflected more easily.

details.name: Fire Atk +2
details.description: Greatly increases the power of Fire attacks and Flaming shots (Flaming S). (Fire attack x1.1 + 60)

details.name: Fire Atk +1
details.description: Increases the power of Fire attacks and Flaming shots (Flaming S). (Fire attack x1.05 + 40)

details.name: Fire Atk Down
details.description: Decreases the power of Fire attacks and Flaming shots (Flaming S). (Fire attack x0.75)

details.name: Fire Res +20
details.description: Increases Fire resistance by 20.

details.name: Fire Res +15
details.description: Increases Fire resistance by 15.

details.name: Fire Res -20
details.description: Decreases Fire resistance by 20.

details.name: Flying Pub Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Knockout King and Horn Maestro.

details.name: Antivirus
details.description: Makes it harder to become Frenzied and enhances recovery. (30% Affinity instead of 15%)

details.name: Resentment
details.description: Increases Attack when your Health Gauge is in the red. (Attack +20)

details.name: Wrath Awoken
details.description: Same effects as Guts and Adrenaline +2.

details.name: Gathering +2
details.description: Often raises the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.

details.name: Gathering +1
details.description: Sometimes raises the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.

details.name: Gathering -1
details.description: Sometimes lowers the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.

details.name: Latent Power +2
details.description: Greatly empowers you for a limited time when certain conditions are met. (After fighting a boss monster for 5 minutes, or taking 180+ damage, grants +50% Affinity and 75% less Stamina consumption for 90 seconds)

details.name: Latent Power +1
details.description: Empowers you for a limited time when certain conditions are met. (After fighting a boss monster for 5 minutes, or taking 180+ damage, grants +30% Affinity and 50% less Stamina consumption for 90 seconds)

details.name: Scavenger
details.description: Gives any item you eat or drink the potential to also raise your maximum Stamina. (33% chance)

details.name: Gourmand
details.description: Increases the efficacy of meat that raises maximum Stamina. (25% chance)

details.name: Grimclaw Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Speed Eating +2 and HG Earplugs.

details.name: Grimclaw Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Speed Eating +2, HG Earplugs and Longer SP.

details.name: Heavy Polish
details.description: Use a whetstone to polish a weapon and briefly increase its strength. (Sharpness won't decrease for 1 minute for Blademasters. Attack Up for 1 minute for Gunners)

details.name: Guard +2
details.description: Greatly increases the likelihood of standing your ground when blocking an attack. (Reduces knockback, stamina drain, and 20 damage)

details.name: Guard +1
details.description: Increases the likelihood of standing your ground when blocking an attack. (Reduces knockback, stamina drain, and 10 damage)

details.name: Guard -1
details.description: Decreases the likelihood of standing your ground when blocking an attack. (Increases knockback, stamina drain, and 10 damage)

details.name: Guard Boost
details.description: Causes previously unblockable attacks to become blockable.

details.name: Guts
details.description: Prevents fainting a single time if struck with a lethal blow when a certain amount of Health remains. (When health is 64 or higher, will be saved from one lethal blow per hunt)

details.name: Sharpness +2
details.description: Increases the length of your weapon's Sharpness Gauge. (Increases the level of the Sharpness Gauge)

details.name: Sharpness +1
details.description: Slightly increases the length of your weapon's Sharpness Gauge. (Increases the length of the Sharpness Gauge slightly)

details.name: TrueShot Up
details.description: Increases the power of Bowgun Internal Ammo, and the Bow's Arc Shot and Power Shot. (Built-In shots, Arc and Power Shots x1.20)

details.name: Health +50
details.description: Increases maximum Health by 50.

details.name: Health +20
details.description: Increases maximum Health by 20.

details.name: Health -10
details.description: Decreases maximum Health by 10.

details.name: Health -30
details.description: Decreases maximum Health by 30.

details.name: HG Earplugs
details.description: Negates the effects of all large monsters' roars.

details.name: Earplugs
details.description: Negates the effects of some large monsters' roars.

details.name: Heat Cancel
details.description: Negates the damage incurred from heat and lava.

details.name: Heat Surge
details.description: Increases the damage incurred from heat and lava.

details.name: Heavy/Heavy Up
details.description: Increases the power of Heavy shots (Heavy S) and Heavy arrows. (Attack 1.10x)

details.name: Hellblade Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Sharpness +2, Shot Booster and Speed Sharpening.

details.name: Hellblade Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Sharpness +2, Bombardier, Shot Booster and Speed Sharpening.

details.name: Hero's Talisman
details.description: Negates the damage from minor enemy attacks.

details.name: Pack Rat
details.description: Same effect as Gathering +2 and Charm Chaser.

details.name: Honey Hunter
details.description: Allows you to gather two Honeys or Royal Honeys at once.

details.name: Tropic Hunter
details.description: Powers you up in the heat. If you drink a Hot Drink... (Grants Heat Cancel, (Attack +15 and Defense +20 in Hot Areas, Hot Drinks give +10 Defense.)

details.name: Negate Hunger
details.description: Negates maximum Stamina depletion.

details.name: Halve Hunger
details.description: Halves maximum Stamina depletion speed.

details.name: Raise Hunger
details.description: Increases maximum Stamina depletion speed.

details.name: Double Hunger
details.description: Greatly increases maximum Stamina depletion speed.

details.name: Ice Atk +2
details.description: Greatly increases the power of Ice attacks and Freeze shots (Freeze S). (Ice attack x1.1 + 60)

details.name: Ice Atk +1
details.description: Increases the power of Ice attacks and Freeze shots (Freeze S). (Ice attack x1.05 + 40)

details.name: Ice Atk Down
details.description: Decreases the power of Ice attacks and Freeze shots (Freeze S). (Ice attack x0.75)

details.name: Ice Res +20
details.description: Increases Ice resistance by 20.

details.name: Ice Res +15
details.description: Increases Ice resistance by 15.

details.name: Ice Res -20
details.description: Decreases Ice resistance by 20.

details.name: Composed
details.description: Makes it easier to fill the Hunter Art, Brave and Alchemy Gauges.

details.name: Knockout King
details.description: Makes it easier to Stun monsters. (Stun x1.10)

details.name: Soul of Kokoto
details.description: Combines the effects of Thunder Res +15 and Spirit's Whim.

details.name: Item Use Up
details.description: Increases the effect time of certain items. (Herbs, drinks, seeds, and pills effect duration increased by 50%)

details.name: Item Use Down
details.description: Decreases the effect time of certain items. (Herbs, drinks, seeds, and pills effect duration decreased by 33%)

details.name: Rationer
details.description: Sometimes allows you to reuse items after you eat and drink them.

details.name: Load Up
details.description: Increases Bowguns and Gunlance ammo capacity, C. Blade phials, and charge attack capacity of Bows.

details.name: Horn Maestro
details.description: Decreases the likelihood of Horn items breaking, and increases the effect time of Hunting Horn melodies. (Horn Melodies last 1 minute longer)

details.name: Explosive Trapper
details.description: Same effects as Bombardier and Trap Master.

details.name: Mounting Master
details.description: Makes it easier to mount and successfully topple a monster. (Mounting damage x1.25 and fills the topple gauge 25% faster)

details.name: Saddle Sore
details.description: Makes it harder to mount and successfully topple a monster.

details.name: Mushromancer
details.description: Allows consumption of mushrooms and grants certain benefits as a result. (Blue Mushroom = Potion, Nitroshroom = Demondrug, Parashroom = Armorskin, Toadstool = Nutrients, Mopeshroom = Dash Juice, Dragon Toadstool = Max Potion, Ripened Mushroom = Ancient Potion)

details.name: Bitter Affinity
details.description: Negative Affinity attacks have a chance to be strong Affinity attacks.

details.name: Nightcloak Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of HG Earplugs, Reload Speed +3 and Steady Hand.

details.name: Nightcloak Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of HG Earplugs, Reload Speed +3, Steady Hand and Trap Master.

details.name: Acrobat
details.description: Same effect as Evasion +1, Constitution +1.

details.name: Use Any Normal S
details.description: Allows all levels of Normal shots (Normal S) to be loaded.

details.name: Normal/Rapid Up
details.description: Increases the power of Normal shots (Normal S) and Rapid-type arrows. (Attack 1.10x)

details.name: Use Para Coat
details.description: Allows Paralysis coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Negate Paralysis
details.description: Prevents Paralysis.

details.name: Double Paralysis
details.description: Doubles the duration of Paralysis.

details.name: Use Any Pellet S
details.description: Allows all levels of Pellet shots (Pellet S) to be loaded.

details.name: Use Lv1 Pellet S
details.description: Allows Lv1 Pellet shots (Pellet S) to be loaded.

details.name: Pellet/Spread Up
details.description: Increases the power of Pellet shots (Pellet S) and Spread-type arrows. (Pellet Attack 1.20x; Spread Attack 1.30x)

details.name: Capture Guru
details.description: Grants knowledge of when a large marked monster can be captured.

details.name: Use Any Pierce S
details.description: Allows all levels of Pierce shots (Pierce S) to be loaded.

details.name: Use Lv1 Pierce S
details.description: Allows Lv1 Pierce shots (Pierce S) to be loaded.

details.name: Pierce/Pierce Up
details.description: Increases the power of Pierce shots (Pierce S) and Pierce-type arrows. (Attack 1.10x)

details.name: Negate Poison
details.description: Weakens the effects of Deadly Poison and completely prevents lesser Poisons. (Deadly Poison is reduced to Poison).

details.name: Double Poison
details.description: Doubles the damage received from Poison.

details.name: Use Poison Coat
details.description: Allows Poison coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Soul of Pokke
details.description: Combines the effects of Ice Res +15 and Gourmand.

details.name: Adrenaline +2
details.description: Greatly increases Attack and Defense when Health is below 40% of the maximum amount. (Defense +45 and Attack x1.30)

details.name: Adrenaline +1
details.description: Greatly increases Defense when Health is below 40% of the maximum amount. (Defense +40)

details.name: Worrywart
details.description: Decreases Defense boost and Attack when Health is below 40% of the maximum amount. (Defense -21 and Attack x-1.30)

details.name: Power Phial (All)
details.description: Allows all levels of Power coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Power Phial (Lv1)
details.description: Allows Lv1 Power coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Alloy Stomach
details.description: Same effect as Speed Eating+2, Meat Lover, and Mushromancer.

details.name: Benediction
details.description: Same effects as Recovery Up and Divine Blessing.

details.name: Steadiness +2
details.description: Greatly decreases Deviation when firing. (2 levels)

details.name: Steadiness +1
details.description: Decreases Deviation when firing. (1 level)

details.name: Steadiness -1
details.description: Increases Deviation when firing. (1 level)

details.name: Steadiness -2
details.description: Greatly increases Deviation when firing. (2 levels)

details.name: Longer SP
details.description: Extends the effect time of the SP State triggered by SP Hunter Arts.

details.name: Divine Blessing
details.description: Sometimes decreases damage taken. (25% chance to receive 30% less damage when hit)

details.name: Demonic Blessing
details.description: Sometimes increases damage taken. (25% chance to receive 30% more damage when hit)

details.name: Fleet Feet
details.description: Same effects as Evade Extender and Peak Performance.

details.name: Autotracker
details.description: Always displays large monsters on the Map, as if they were marked.

details.name: Detect
details.description: Increases the information displayed on the Map when large monsters are marked.

details.name: Punishing Draw
details.description: Can Stun monsters with draw attacks from cutting weapons, and slightly increases Attack. (Attack +5)

details.name: Outdoorsman
details.description: Always shows the Map, even if you don't have one. Easier to fish and BBQ meat.

details.name: Sheath Control
details.description: Same effects as Punishing Draw and Quick Sheath.

details.name: Recovery Up
details.description: Increases the efficacy of Health recovery items. (Health Recovery +25)

details.name: Recovery Down
details.description: Decreases the efficacy of Health recovery items. (Health Recovery -25)

details.name: Recovery Spd +2
details.description: Greatly speeds recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge). (Health recovery rate x4)

details.name: Recovery Spd +1
details.description: Speeds recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge). (Health recovery rate x2)

details.name: Recovery Spd -1
details.description: Slows recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge). (Health recovery rate 1/2)

details.name: Recovery Spd -2
details.description: Greatly slows recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge). (Health recovery rate 1/4)

details.name: Recoil Down +3
details.description: Greatly reduces Bowgun recoil. (3 levels)

details.name: Recoil Down +2
details.description: Reduces Bowgun recoil. (2 levels)

details.name: Recoil Down +1
details.description: Slightly reduces Bowgun recoil. (1 level)

details.name: Recoil Down -1
details.description: Slightly increases Bowgun recoil. (1 level)

details.name: Recoil Down -2
details.description: Increases Bowgun recoil. (2 levels)

details.name: Recoil Down -3
details.description: Greatly increases Bowgun recoil. (3 levels)

details.name: Bonus Shot
details.description: Allows one extra shot to be fired while Rapid Firing.

details.name: Redhelm Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Focus and Resentment.

details.name: Redhelm Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Focus, Resentment and Marathon Runner.

details.name: Reload Speed +3
details.description: Greatly speeds up Bowgun reloading, and auto-loads Bow coatings.

details.name: Reload Speed +2
details.description: Speeds up Bowgun reloading, and auto-loads Bow coatings.

details.name: Reload Speed +1
details.description: Slightly speeds up Bowgun reloading, and speeds up Bow-coating loading.

details.name: Reload Speed -1
details.description: Slightly slows down Bowgun reloading and Bow-coating loading.

details.name: Reload Speed -2
details.description: Slows down Bowgun reloading and Bow-coating loading.

details.name: Reload Speed -3
details.description: Greatly slows down Bowgun reloading and Bow-coating loading.

details.name: Iron Wall
details.description: Same effects as Defense Up (L) and Iron Skin.

details.name: Rustrazor Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Guard +2 and Quick Sheath.

details.name: Rustrazor Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Guard +2, Quick Sheath and Bladescale Hone.

details.name: Skill +2
details.description: Adds a further two Skill Points to all Skills with points invested.

details.name: Sneak
details.description: Decreases the likelihood of being targeted by monsters.

details.name: Taunt
details.description: Increases the likelihood of being targeted by monsters.

details.name: Speed Sharpening
details.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening.

details.name: Slow Sharpening
details.description: Slows down weapon sharpening.

details.name: Razor Sharp
details.description: Halves the rate at which your weapon loses Sharpness.

details.name: Blunt Edge
details.description: Doubles the rate at which your weapon loses Sharpness.

details.name: Quick Sheath
details.description: Increases weapon-sheathing speed.

details.name: Challenge Sheath
details.description: Sheathing when a monster is enraged gives a chance to sharpen your weapon.

details.name: Silverwind Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Evasion +2 and Critical Eye +3.

details.name: Silverwind Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Evasion +2, Critical Eye +3 and Sneak.

details.name: Negate Sleep
details.description: Prevents Sleep.

details.name: Double Sleep
details.description: Doubles the duration of Sleep.

details.name: Use Sleep Coat
details.description: Allows Sleep coatings to be set when equipped with a Bow.

details.name: Snowbaron Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Evade Extender and Stam Recov Up.

details.name: Snowbaron Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Evade Extender, Mounting Master and Stam Recov Up.

details.name: Soaratorium Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Dragon Res +15 and Bio Researcher.

details.name: Soulseer Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Critical Eye +3 and Challenger +1.

details.name: Soulseer Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Critical Eye +3 and Challenger +2.

details.name: Trap Master
details.description: Guarantees trap Combinations will succeed, and speeds up trap- and bomb-setting time.

details.name: Challenger +2
details.description: Greatly increases Attack and Affinity when a large monster in the same area becomes angry. (Attack +20 and Affinity 15% when a monster is enraged)

details.name: Challenger +1
details.description: Increases Attack and Affinity when a large monster in the same area becomes angry. (Attack +10 and Affinity 10% when a monster is enraged)

details.name: Shield Bearer
details.description: Same effects as Guard Boost and Stam Recov Up.

details.name: Stamina Thief
details.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to Exhaust monsters. (Exhaust x1.20)

details.name: Stam Recov Up
details.description: Increases Stamina recovery speed.

details.name: Stam Recov Down
details.description: Decreases Stamina recovery speed.

details.name: Marathon Runner
details.description: Slows down Stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain Stamina (such as dashing).

details.name: Short Sprinter
details.description: Speeds up Stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain Stamina (such as dashing).

details.name: Status Atk +2
details.description: Increases the potency of abnormal status attacks. (Status x1.225)

details.name: Status Atk +1
details.description: Slightly increases the potency of abnormal status attacks. (Status x1.125)

details.name: Status Attack Down
details.description: Decreases the potency of abnormal status attacks. (Status x0.9)

details.name: Wellness
details.description: Grants immunity to Poison, Paralysis, Sleep, and Stun.

details.name: Silver Bullet
details.description: Same effects as Normal/Rapid Up, Pierce/Pierce Up, and Pellet/Spread Up.

details.name: Stonefist Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Razor Sharp, Recoil Down +2 and Divine Blessing.

details.name: Stonefist Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Razor Sharp, Recoil Down +2, Divine Blessing and Constitution +1.

details.name: Negate Stun
details.description: Prevents Stun.

details.name: Halve Stun
details.description: Reduces the likelihood of being Stunned by 50%.

details.name: Double Stun
details.description: Makes it harder to recover from being Stunned.

details.name: Fortify
details.description: Increases your Attack and Defense every time you fall in battle. (Attack x1.1 and Defense x1.15 after the first faint. Attack x1.2 and Defense x1.30 after the second faint)

details.name: Double Talisman
details.description: Doubles the amount of Skill Points gained through talismans.

details.name: Palico Cheer
details.description: Allows "Fist Pump" gesture to call back fainted/recovering Palicoes. Cannot be used repeatedly.

details.name: Palico Rally
details.description: Increases the Attack and Defense of Palicoes.

details.name: Weakness Exploit
details.description: Increases Affinity when striking body parts upon which your attacks are highly effective. (Affinity rises by 50% against monster parts with 45 weakness or higher)

details.name: Thunder Atk +2
details.description: Greatly increases the power of Thunder attacks and Thunder shots (Thunder S). (Thunder attack x1.1 normal + 60)

details.name: Thunder Atk +1
details.description: Increases the power of Thunder attacks and Thunder shots (Thunder S). (Thunder attack x1.05 + 40)

details.name: Thunder Atk Down
details.description: Decreases the power of Thunder attacks and Thunder shots (Thunder S). (Thunder attack x0.75)

details.name: Thunderlord Soul
details.description: Combines the effects of Latent Power +2 and Constitution +2.

details.name: Thunderlord Soul X
details.description: Combines the effects of Latent Power +2, Constitution +2 and Focus.

details.name: Thunder Res +20
details.description: Increases Thunder resistance by 20.

details.name: Thunder Res +15
details.description: Increases Thunder resistance by 15.

details.name: Thunder Res -20
details.description: Decreases Thunder resistance by 20.

details.name: Pro Transporter
details.description: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.

details.name: Tremor Res
details.description: Prevents staggering from tremors created by large monsters.

details.name: Peak Performance
details.description: Increases Attack when your Health Gauge is full. (Attack + 20)

details.name: Airborne
details.description: Increases the damage caused by Jumping Attacks. (Aerial attacks deal x1.1 damage)

details.name: Water Atk +2
details.description: Greatly increases the power of Water attacks and Water shots (Water S). (Water attack x1.1 + 60)

details.name: Water Atk +1
details.description: Increases the power of Water attacks and Water shots (Water S). (Water attack x1.05 + 40)

details.name: Water Atk Down
details.description: Decreases the power of Water attacks and Water shots (Water S). (Water attack x0.75)

details.name: Water Res +20
details.description: Increases Water resistance by 20.

details.name: Water Res +15
details.description: Increases Water resistance by 15.

details.name: Water Res -20
details.description: Decreases Water resistance by 20.

details.name: Divine Whim
details.description: Greatly decreases the likelihood of Pickaxes, Bug Nets, Boomerangs, and Horns breaking. (50% chance)

details.name: Spirit's Whim
details.description: Decreases the likelihood of Pickaxes, Bug Nets, Boomerangs and Horns breaking. (25% chance)

details.name: Spectre's Whim
details.description: Increases the likelihood of Pickaxes, Bug Nets, Boomerangs and Horns breaking. (25% chance)

details.name: Devil's Whim
details.description: Greatly increases the likelihood of Pickaxes, Bug Nets, Boomerangs and Horns breaking. (50% chance)

details.name: Wide-Range +2
details.description: Transfers the effects of certain items to companions in the same area. (Herb, Potion, Antidote, Adamant Seed, Might Seed, and Nulberry affects allies in the same area)

details.name: Wide-Range +1
details.description: Transfers a portion of the effects of certain items to companions in the same area. (Herb, Potion, Antidote, Adamant Seed, Might Seed, and Nulberry affects allies in the same area with 50% effectiveness)

details.name: Windproof (Hi)
details.description: Negates Wind Pressure from almost all monsters.

details.name: Windproof (Lo)
details.description: Lessens almost all Wind Pressure.

details.name: Soul of Yukumo
details.description: Combines the effects of Water Res +15 and Honey Hunter.
